Package ibis.io

Interface Summary
Constants  
DataInput The DataInput interface provides methods to read data.
DataOutput The DataOutput interface provides methods to write data.
Replacer Object replacer, used in object serialization..
Serializable This is the interface implemented by classes that have been rewritten using IOGenerator.
SerializationInput The SerializationInput interface specifies which methods must be implemented by any serialization input stream type.
SerializationOutput The SerializationOutput interface specifies which methods must be implemented by any serialization output stream type.
 

Class Summary
BufferedArrayInputStream This is a complete implementation of DataInputStream.
BufferedArrayOutputStream This is a complete implementation of DataOutputStream.
ByteSerializationInputStream The ByteSerializationInputStream class can be used when only byte serialization is needed.
ByteSerializationOutputStream The ByteSerializationOutputStream class can be used when only byte serialization is needed.
Conversion  
DataInputStream A general data input stream.
DataOutputStream A general data output stream.
DataOutputStreamSplitter Contract: write to multiple outputstreams.
DataSerializationInputStream This is the SerializationInputStream version that is used for Data serialization.
DataSerializationOutputStream This is the SerializationOutputStream version that is used for data serialization.
DeepCopy Exports a single static method that creates a deep copy of any serializable object.
DummyInputStream An InputStream that can be placed on top of any existing java.io.InputStream.
DummyOutputStream An OutputStream that can be placed on top of any existing java.io.OutputStream.
Generator The Generator class is the base class for IOGenerator-generated classes that are generated for a single purpose: to have a method that generates a new instance of an object by reading it from a IbisSerializationInputStream.
HandleHash A hash table that aims for speed for pairs (Object, int).
IbisSerializationInputStream This is the SerializationInputStream version that is used for Ibis serialization.
IbisSerializationOutputStream This is the SerializationOutputStream version that is used for Ibis serialization.
IbisVector  
IOProperties Collects all system properties used by the ibis.io package.
OutputStreamSplitter Contract: write to multiple outputstreams.
SerializationBase A base class for all Ibis serialization classes, providing some method implementations that they share.
SerializationTimer  
SimpleBigConversion  
SimpleLittleConversion  
SunSerializationInputStream The SunSerializationInputStream class is the "glue" between SerializationInputStream and ObjectInputStream.
SunSerializationOutputStream The SunSerializationOutputStream class is the "glue" between SerializationOutputStream and ObjectOutputStream.
 

Exception Summary
IbisIOException  
SplitterException  
 

Error Summary
SerializationError
